sub_title: CEO & Country Manager Netherlands / Group Transformation Office VP at ENGIE
summary:
Passionate about energy and the human factor in business, I have had have the great privilege to bring meaningful contributions to the energy transition(s) in different geographies - always with outstanding, driven & committed colleagues and partners. 

Today, I have the pleasure to combine 2 positions within ENGIE: as head of the Group Transformation Office in Paris and as CEO & Country manager in the Netherlands.

#NetZeroCarbon  #ActWithENGIE #TransitionMakers
